name: Street Food Gastronomy- Doing it Like a Local
description: Street food is culture deeply rooted in the cities of Vietnam, so much so that you will find many families cooking their home-meals on the sidewalk while their motocycles are conveniently parked in their living rooms. :) It wouldn't be stretch to say that Hanoi is the street food capital of the world - anything from egg coffee (yes, the Vietnamese have put egg in coffee and made it work!), Pho Beef noodles), Bun Cha (grilled pork patties with noodles), Nem (spring rolls), Ban Xeo (Vietnamese Pancakes) to name a few.
